Package game.character

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Character
    Represents any character in the game.
    Dialogue
    Provides the dialogue for the InnKeeper
    Hero
    Represents a Hero as described in section 3.2 of the specification.
    InnKeeper
    An innkeeper talks to the player and offers to sell them items.
    Villain
    Represents a Villain as described in section 3.3 of the specification.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HeroAbility
    Represents the different kinds of abilities that Heroes can have.
    HeroType
    The types of Heroes that exist in the game.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HeroDeadException
    The exception to be thrown when a Hero dies in battle.
    VillainDeadException
    The exception to be thrown when the Villain dies.
